long_description: With advanced light-reactive technology, the stylish Smith Touchstone Polorchromic sunglasses adapt to changing light levels, fine-tuning the tint to meet your needs on the go. Polarchromic lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses are perfect for high altitude and open water environments. Copper-tint lenses maximize colors and depth perception while reducing glare; polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight Techlite(TM) lenses feature high-quality borosilicate glass that is polished and chemically tempered for increased shatter resistance. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. The Smith Touchstone Polorchromic sunglasses have a medium fit with large coverage.
